modName: Nordic Female Trousers CBBE HDT Bodyslided
summary: This mod represents variant of heavy armor based on nordic caved armor for female character, but its only trousers.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is female nordic trousers based on nordic caved armor made for cbbe body with hdt support.This mod is made for players who want to have their character go topless.Its a heavy armor by its type and craftable in the forge,also upgradeable by workbench depending on your smithing skill.Its using clasic armor slot 32-body,have support for hdt physics,and only work on CBBE HDT and Cosio Body as well, while it won't work with CBBE Normal,TBBP or BBP body.I didn't made it NMM installer compatible so you must extract it manually and first thing you must do is to build your armor based on your slider preset you used for your body and slider set is called "Nordic Trousers".

Requirements:
Bodyslide and Outfit Studio: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?
XPMSE Skeleton: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/ is one i recommened and use myself.
Dragonborn DLC
CBBE Body and HDT Physics Extension as listed above.
author: micko9952
